rvolosatovs opened PR #11970 from rvolosatovs:feat/wasip3-into-http to bytecodealliance:main:

Refs https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/11843#issuecomment-3476664833

  • Verify content-length of bodies originating from the host (even though Request::new assumes that it's already been validated, guest could construct a request using a host body it received from e.g. handle call)
  • Return ErrorCode, rather than anyhow::Error on conversion
  • Return the request options as part of conversion
